Phoenix Children's is proud to announce its new Center for Cancer and Blood Disorders (CCBD) outpatient clinic and infusion center officially opened its doors this morning on the 2nd floor of the Hospital's Main Tower! The new 17,000-square-foot space further increases the Hospital's capacity to care for children and adults fighting pediatric cancer and complex blood disorders. Thank you to all of the donors, Hospital administration, CCBD staff and patient families who helped make this happen! Today is a day to celebrate our new home and lasting courage.
Realtor, donating 20% to Phoenix Children's Hospital

Helping you come home to a great Neighborhood is what I do. Phoenix has many personalities. Essentially a consortium of individual communities, each with its own character, some neighborhoods of this sprawling metropolitan area retain a small town feel while others have landed feet first in the future. There is true diversity in and near the heart of Phoenix.  BuyersHave you ever fallen in love with a home listed online only to find out it was under contract? I have, and that is why I made a vow that when I became a Realtor my web site would only show active listings from the MLS. Stop wasting your time and getting your hopes up for a home that is already spoken for. I will get you the home you want and negotiate the best price possible and closing terms that meet your needs. I also have in-house lenders to help you get your property financed at a competitive rate. If there is grant money available to eligible buyers I will find it for you.SellersWhen you sold your house in the past did you feel like you heard more from your Realtor before you signed the contract to list your house then after? That won’t happen here. I communicate throughout the process of selling your home and make sure it is sold for the optimum price in the quickest fashion possible. I am an extremely effective marketer and will feature your home across numerous avenues .
Realtor, donating 20% to Phoenix Children's Hospital at UpTown Realty
UpTown Realty merged with Clayton Nash Real Estate June 2017.

It’s time for a different approach to staffing. One without corporate overhead, red tape and cookie-cutter solutions. Your business is growing…evolving. And you deserve a staffing partner that has the flexibility and creativity necessary to help you continue to grow.  When you work with us 100% of the revenue you spend on our services stays in Arizona unlike most national firms and franchises.At HR Relief, we bring a savvy team of staffing experts who have been in that “corporate, red tape” world. And we know that there’s a better way. One that takes a hands-on, consultative approach to helping you reach your goals, while delivering truly exemplary professionals who are ready to make an impact.We offer a wide range of placement capabilities ranging from Healthcare, IT, Administrative, Clerical, Finance,  and Customer Service.  We work with companies and job seekers with whom we feel we can deliver required solutions.To help determine the reliability and work ethic of potential hourly candidates, we use a highly-refined technology called Global Work Styles Inventory (GWSI) ™.  This online screening tool helps identify desirable and undesirable characteristics of employees in high turnover positions including administrative, clerical and call center. With (GWSI) ™, HR Relief can help you prevent common workplace issues like poor attendance, tardiness, turnover, low productivity and safety violations. Saving you time, cost and stress!Furthermore (GWSI) ™  provides insight into three major areas affecting the success of a new employee:FlexibilityTrustworthinessAbility to accept criticismThese three areas are critical in determining the likelihood of a temporary employee, or any employee’s,  success in a new position or a changing work environment.(GWSI) ™ provides a more comprehensive approach to conducting a behavioral interview by producing an interview roadmap designed to hone in on the strengths (and potential weaknesses) of candidates.
Greater Boston Area and San Francisco

I began working at Lycos  just a few months after it went public. Back then the major search engines were Lycos, Yahoo, Excite, InfoSeek and Alta Vista. This was a time when Amazon only sold books! It was a crazy ride that was full of 70 hour work weeks and eating 3 meals per day at the office. Harnessing the power of internet search, as it related to selling products and advertising, was just beginning to be maximized.  Google went public 3 ½ years after my time ended with Lycos.

summary: I feel fortunate to be able to donate 20% of every commission I earn to Phoenix Children's Hospital. The magnitude of their effect on so many lives is truly amazing. While raising donations, I am able to help home buyers find the homes of their dreams and sellers move on to the next stage of their lives. If you are going to buy or sell a home, or know someone who is, please consider helping me donate even more to this great organization in my role as a Realtor.
name: David Chesnik
title: Realtor, donating 20% to Phoenix Children's Hospital at Clayton Nash Real Estate
